Functions
RLEp_UnpackToRAM
u16 RLEp_UnpackToRAM(
const u8* src,
u8* dst RLEP_FIXSIZE_PARAM
)

Unpack RLEp compressed data to memory

Parameters
src
const u8*

Source data

dst

Destination data in RAM

size

Size of the data to unpack (only if COMPRESS_USE_RLEP_FIXSIZE is defined)

Return

Unpacked data size
